name: F-Zero RPG 4: Final Lap
description:
The final game in the F-Zero RPG series. This time you play as the character Ryu Suzaku. He is an up and coming bounty hunter looking to make a name for himself. Eventually, he gets involved in one of the biggest bounties ever.

Features: 8 playable characters, Multiple F-Zero races, Fully animated cut scenes , Diverse soundtrack, Surprise appearances by various Nintendo characters, A branching story line based on the choices you make, Fully customizable hero And many more!
